title: Dividend stocks in focus as OCR cuts hit term deposit returns – Stock Takes
description: Dividend stocks like Sky TV and Spark now offer yields of 10% or more.
content:
Just like mortgage rates, theres a bit of a lag for people who were locked in a term deposit.
They may well be getting 4.0%, 4.5% or even 5.0% but at some point that will expire, he said.
